Text: Play Toys Imagination Hours of FunOur play toys nurture creative spirits Remember what it was like to be a kid You just couldnt grow up fast enough Things havent changedyour kids love to pretend theyre just like you In fact chances are theyre already imitating the things you do around the house Playing with Dads tools and dressing up in Moms clothes are all a natural part of growing up The best toys for imaginative play are ones that encourage kids to try out these new roles in a way thats safe and fun Our Workbench Desk and Tool Kit let children pretend to fix things and a Vanity Table and Makeup Kit make it fun to dress up for that special tea party Go directly to the following items Workbench Desk Tool Kit Vanity Table Makeup Kit Visit our Featured Gifts section Or view our entire collection of play toys Shop potterybarnkidscom Catalog Quickshop Store Locator If you prefer not to receive email messages from us please reply to this message with remove as the subject line Your name will be removed from our email list Privacy Guarantee Pottery Barn Kids supports and adheres to the guidelines and practices adopted by the Direct Marketing Associations Privacy Promise to American Consumers Copyright Pottery Barn Kids All rights reserved
